name: BrizLabs
0:
”Alexa, turn on the curtain lights.”
”Alexa, set the curtain lights to fifty.”
”Alexa, set curtain lights to green.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
BrizLabs goes beyond traditional holiday lights and lighting products to deliver products that entertain and connect people's lives.

At BrizLabs, we combine the latest innovations with our products, to enable consumers an easy way to experience the connected home. We feature a smart design that gives you the ability to personalize your lighting effects and lives for an even greater experience. 

The BrizLabs app, the smart light decoration and lighting system make your Christmas, Halloween, Easter, Wedding, Party and more events unforgettable. 

Organize your smart lights your way 
Whether you use just a few lights or have completely outfitted your home in BrizLabs app, you can organize your smart lights with ease. 

Easily control your lights - from anywhere
Adjust your lights' brightness, color temperature, color and control multiple lights across Rooms or Zones all from the BrizLabs app.

Personalize with automations
Make your smart lights work around your daily routine.
Whether you want your lights to gently wake you up in the morning or greet you when you get home, setting up customisable automations in the BrizLabs app is effortless and fun!

Hands-free voice control
Use Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant to control your smart lights with just your voice. Simple voice commands let you turn lights on and off, dim and brighten or even change colors without you ever lifting a finger.

Smart Light • Ambiance Lighting
Illuminate Your Festive Moments

Find out more about the official BrizLabs app:
www.brizlabs.com/app
